page.title: 11Tollesbury Village
page.content: We live in Tollesbury. Tollesbury is about half a km square, people usually come here because of the Estuary. There are two churches, one is St. Mary's and the other is United Reform. The main street goes straight through the village right down to Mell Farm and the River Blackwater. There is one petrol garage as you enter the village, 3 public houses The Hope, The Victoria and the Kings Head and a British Legion Club, also a school, post office and several shops. Around the village are five farms. We also have a doctor's surgery, a bank and a volunteer fire service with one fire engine. Tollesbury is a good place to live.
